name: Apes Get Out of Trams
description:
Apes get out of trams is a 2d RPG with a unique cringy aesthetic. Here, you will create a squad from 28(Currently, there are 13) different characters, to find THE GREAT SEVEN DRAGON EGGS and save the world.

There was the idea for a school project: What if I make a game from ideas of my classmates and our folklore. The result you will see here.

This is the only 2nd chapter. The game isn't finished now. Feel free to critique.

Development of the project is paused, it will continue at the beginning of September.
